article.description: Donovan Fields scored 12 points and Josh Martin got his fifth career double-double to help Cal Poly snap a five-game skid with a 73-40 win over Division II Notre Dame de Namur on Saturday night.
article.headline: Cal Poly beats DII Notre Dame de Namure 73-40 to snap skid
article.linkText: Cal Poly beats DII Notre Dame de Namure 73-40 to snap skid
article.story: SAN LUIS OBISPO, Calif. -- Donovan Fields scored 12 points and Josh Martin got his fifth career double-double to help Cal Poly snap a five-game skid with a 73-40 win over Division II Notre Dame de Namur on Saturday night. Martin had 11 rebounds to go with 10 points, Victor Joseph added 11 points and Marcellus Garrick also finished with 10 points for Cal Poly, which controlled the glass 42-30. Cal Poly (5-9) raced out to a 15-2 lead to open the game, getting 3-pointers from Joseph, Fields and Jakub Niziol during the run and never trailed. The Mustangs took a 41-20 advantage into the break and continued to pull away in the second half. Omar Lo and Chazz Wade led Notre Dame de Namur with eight points apiece. It was the 16th meeting between the programs, with Cal Poly extending its advantage over the Argonauts to 15-1 and 2-0 since moving to Division I.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
